titles.title: CVN-76 Procurement Termination and Deficit Reduction Act of 1994
A bill to delay procurement of the CVN-76 aircraft carrier.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6392-6394)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7104)

bill.summary: 5/25/1994--Introduced. CVN-76 Procurement Termination and Deficit Reduction Act of 1994 - Prohibits entering into any contract for the procurement of a CVN-76 aircraft carrier before October 1, 1999. Terminates all such contracts entered into before the date of enactment of this Act.
